Here is the list of zodiac signs and their scores on the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) line, along with a brief description for each:
1. Aries - 4/12 - Aries are often impulsive and action-oriented, but they also value independence and can be resistant to change.
2. Taurus - 9/12 - Tauruses are known for their practicality and reliability, making them strong contributors on the line.
3. Gemini - 7/12 - Geminis are communicative and adaptable, but they can also be scattered and prone to distraction.
4. Cancer - 5/12 - Cancers are caring and emotional, but they can also be moody and overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 6/12 - Leos are confident and charismatic, but they can also be prideful and dominating.
6. Virgo - 8/12 - Virgos are analytical and hardworking, making them strong contributors on the line.
7. Libra - 10/12 - Librans are diplomatic and social, valuing harmony and balance.
8. Scorpio - 3/12 - Scorpios are intense and passionate, but they can also be secretive and controlling.
9. Sagittarius - 11/12 - Sagittarians are adventurous and optimistic, valuing freedom and exploration.
10. Capricorn - 1/12 - Capricorns are practical and responsible, but they can also be serious and restrictive.
11. Aquarius - 2/12 - Aquarians are independent and humanitarian, but they can also be unconventional and rebellious.
12. Pisces - 9/12 - Pisces are imaginative and empathetic, valuing intuition and connection.
